website_summaries.verdict: Perfectly proportioned for small dogs, the Lil' Plates line contains the quality meats, veggies, and fruits you’d expect from Merrick, with no grains in a teeth-cleaning crunchy kibble.
pros: Smaller-size kibble pieces for small breeds
Real deboned lamb is the first ingredient
Made with prebiotics for digestive health
Poultry-free for dogs with food allergies
cons: Intended for extra-small, small, and toy breeds

customer_reviews.title: Changed the formula made my dog sick. Hair in kibbles now GROSS
customer_reviews.text: They changed the formula of this food, it's such a shame. My dog loved it he would eat it so fast, made him so happy. But now the kibbles look and smell different, and there are hairs sticking out of the kibbles. It is so disgusting. My dog wouldn't eat it and whatever he did made him throw up. We couldn't figure out why he seemed sick for a couple of days then we took this food away and now he's fine. I would never buy it ever again. It's such a shame.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Beware, this is so gross
customer_reviews.text: There was a live snail in the bag of food. Seriously, literally a live snail. I'll never buy this brand again, i'm still so disgusted
customer_reviews.author: Jill Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: ... eat it I don’t know if I got a bad batch or what’s goin on but I won’t be ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got this food in and I started giving it to my two little dogs one is a 6lb Maltese the other a short Jack Russell pup about 7lbs since eating this food they have both started throwing up after every time they eat it I don’t know if I got a bad batch or what’s goin on but I won’t be giving them anymore
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Meet Sugar and Lil One
customer_reviews.text: Merrick is never manufactured in China and meets all AAFCO & FDA regulations. This is my 3rd bag of Merrick although my previous 2 were Lamb. Both my Multipoo and tiny Yorkie have gorgeous coats and happy dispositions which I feel are related to switching to Merrick. The reason for only 4 stars is the lamb flavor isn't available in the 12lb size. Both my furbabies much prefer it to either the Beef or chicken both of which are very common allergens in dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: Finally...
customer_reviews.text: A healthy food my dogs will actually eat! I am adamant that my two dogs eat quality food...problem is they have hated most every kind I've tried!! Always had to add something to the other dog foods to get them to eat it! They love this food! Finally a food they will eat that is good for them! We've tried both beef and chicken and they love both! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: lexie

customer_reviews.title: dog allergy triggered
customer_reviews.text: I changed to this food from Acana Lamb and Apple.. Should't of fixed what wasn't broke. After a week of eating the Merrick my dog broke out in a terrible skin allergy.. I stopped the food and within a week, every part of the allergy was gone..It could of been some other factor but it looks like it was food.. So back to Acana and my dog has no issues...
customer_reviews.author: So Cal So Cal

customer_reviews.title: Did not agree with our dog’s stomach
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in hopes that it would help our dog get her digestive problems in order. Instead it made them much, much worse. We have tried it again a couple of times since purchasing to make sure it is indeed this that is the important variable and it’s diarrhea city every time.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Michael Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Warning ⚠️ just opened this bag and there are sharp plastic like pieces sticking out !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Muneca

customer_reviews.title: Spit it out!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy hated it. She went back to eating the old dog food (Nature’s Recipe)which she didn’t like after ten months of eating it.. That was the reason I bought this food. She loves beef and I thought she would like it. Spit it right out of her mouth literally over and over. Onto the next brand.
customer_reviews.author: Whoisit

customer_reviews.title: Great for my small and large breed dog with sensitive teeth
customer_reviews.text: Both our girls have been using this dog food for 3 years. My 13 lbs dog (pictured) eats this and has beautiful hair, good gums and a healthy energy level. My 13 year old dog has sensitive teeth (dental work needed in the past) and she actually eats this. It’s for small breed but she’s a large breed and it’s been great for her.
customer_reviews.author: M&S

customer_reviews.title: Picky puppy loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I have the pickiest and most allergic dog on the planet (shihtzu) and I've tried everything - even soft food and she gobbles this down! I just add a bit of water to soften it. No indication or stomach problems either.
customer_reviews.author: mismiddleton

customer_reviews.title: I don't think my puppers like it very much
customer_reviews.text: Mixing the foods this past week to gradually transition my dogs properly and he picks out his old food (wellness trufood) and leaves this new food as you can see in the photo. This gave my yorkies digestive issues such as smelly poo, strange belly gurgles, and just not eating it. I guess we will be switching back.
customer_reviews.author: Bay08

customer_reviews.title: Noms for the Puppercinos.
customer_reviews.text: Puppers love this food. I have a mix who has sensitive skin and a really funky under bite. (He is Boston terrier and most likely rat terrier.) This is small enough for him to eat without too much trouble, and can almost keep up with his "brother". His skin redness and random welts have nearly gone away and both their coats are super soft and shiny!
customer_reviews.author: Sumi Casey

customer_reviews.title: Not a favorite with our Boston
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this product. My Boston loved the chicken version, but we decided to give the salmon a try. She would smell it and run back to her crate. We tried mixing it with her old food, and she'll have a little, but wouldn't return for more. The little she ate gave her tummy aches, lots of gas and very soft bowel movements. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Nora M

customer_reviews.title: Very high protein percentage
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my two small yorkies...It has very high protein percentage and it tore up my pups' stomachs and made them sick. We tossed the entire bag and put them back on other foods.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Crunchy, healthy, small kibble
customer_reviews.text: Hugeeeeee portion! I pour some in a container for the kitchen and keep the rest out of reach stored. My little bean loves this food, she adores dinner time. I love this brand - affordable, healthy, quality controlled food for our little nuggets. Easy to buy this bag so I don’t have to go to the store all the time. Shipped quickly and arrived on time. Thanks Merrick and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Dog refuses to eat it
customer_reviews.text: My Yorkshire terrier refuses to eat this so it’s basically a waste of money. Also since it’s grain free; peas are listed as an ingredient, the FDA has listed grain free dog foods with peas and legumes have a higher incidence of causing heart conditions in dogs and this brand was listed so the bag was discarded and thrown in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalPat

customer_reviews.title: Supposedly contains healthy ingredients but the dogs hate it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the smallest bag to try it out on my dog and I am glad I did because my dog wanted no part of this food. Now my dog will at times get fussy so I tried it on a neighbors Labrador who will eat everything you give him and ask for more. The Lab wanted no part of this food either and I have never seen him turn food of any kind away before. I waited 2 days and tried both dogs again but the results were the same. I cannot recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: TheOldPhart

customer_reviews.title: Not good...
customer_reviews.text: Three healthy dogs refuse to eat this. Household is on a tight budget so it is left out until they r very hungry and finally eat it as it cannot be returned. All three are vomiting periodically now they are on this. We had another of this brand's formulas before and it was fine but that was years ago. Of the three dogs one is a white toy poodle and her tear stains have increased with this food along with the vomiting. Trusted this company for years. Not sure what has changed but it's a concern..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bag was Torn & had dampness outside bag upon recieving.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to giving this to my dog, but with some peices spilled out in the box due to a tear in the bag & what looked like finger print dampness outside the bag, I am very hesitant to give it to my dog. Sure smells good & he wants some, but theres that thought in back of your mind, is it tainted,why is the bag torn & peices out loose in the box (around 20 pieces) ... Cant rate higher with damaged in shipping product.
customer_reviews.author: justjess

customer_reviews.title: No grains no hidden preservatives, great for Shih Tzu.
customer_reviews.text: Feel I have found a good brand. Recommended by shih Tzu site. Hoping this puppy skips all the kidney problems later. Yes expensive, but I do not want Vet bills from GMO products. Our dog is regular, she also like the beef flavor However, a small dog does not eat 12 lbs of dog food every month. The subscription feature say every two months, but my delivery date is August. I have tried changing, confirm and it does not work why?
customer_reviews.author: Natty in MS

customer_reviews.title: Great food, love the kibble size for my wee little ones.
customer_reviews.text: This kibble is great! I was feeding my two chihuahuas Wellness Core for over 2 years, but one of them developed an allergy to poultry, resulting in itchy skin, runny eyes, lethargy and vomitting. I switched them over to Merrick 'Lil Plates Poultry-Free varieties, and the allergy cleared up within a month - it's been close to a year now and they are still thriving on this food. I rotate the protein source with each bag - they seem to really enjoy the lamb flavour the most!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: Super upset
customer_reviews.text: My dog got massive diarrhea from it. I feel so bad for him :(
customer_reviews.author: farah1228

customer_reviews.title: Merrick are unbeatable! Will be buying again
customer_reviews.text: My little one switched to Merrick Grain Free kibble after we discovered her poultry allergy - not one for feeding our family members the same old boring food, the only reason I haven't bought an Amazon click button for this is because we like to switch flavors. Merrick are undoubtedly catching many pets in the market who are trying to avoid poultry - will definitely be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn FTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Causing diarrhea?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what changed, if any, with the product but the last two bags I've ordered have given my dog a bad case of diarrhea. A little bummed to have to change their food again, since they were doing so well on it and I thought it would be the last time in awhile that I'd have to change their food up. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hairs embedded in kibble
customer_reviews.text: Most of the kibble had tiny hairs embedded. Called customer service and they said this was from pigs and was to be expected. Not harmful but they can't keep this out. Just to be clear, this was not a few hairs, it's in most of the kibble. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ksenia

customer_reviews.title: The best Dog food & customer service!
customer_reviews.text: My Gracie loves Merrick dog food. Keeps her healthy and makes her coat shine! The only food I buy her. I would like to update my review of this product. Recently I reached out to Merrick with a product concern. Tania, a customer service agent responded to my email immediately. She addressed all my concerns and resolved my issues professionally and courteously. That single interaction combined with how happy Gracie is with her food, makes us customers for life. Thank you...
customer_reviews.author: Art Harris

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog extremely sick for days
customer_reviews.text: This food made my dog so sick, he was throwing up and with diarrhea for 3 days, once we took his food away and fed him only boiled chicken breast it all went away and than I read online that this brand is for making dogs sick, so we switched back to blue buffalo and he is doing just fine hasn’t had any episodes since we took the food away, I read some dogs have to be rehydrated in the hospital, thank god we found what was happening fast, I will never buy this food again, waste of money almost the entire bag went in the garbage
customer_reviews.author: Karla A

customer_reviews.title: My dog won't eat it.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 12 week old puppy and her mother who are both chowhounds. I have been wanting to get them on better food because of the excessive bowel emptying. I read the reviews and decided I would spend what I had to for the best quality food I could afford. I bought one 4 pound bag from Amazon and one directly from Merrick. $35 later and they will not eat this stuff. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Multiple Media Artist

customer_reviews.title: My dog gives it his highest endorsement!
customer_reviews.text: I discovered my dog is allergic to poultry, and researched to find a highly rated alternative food. He loves this. An amazing and happy, though unforeseen benefit is that the chronic tear stains under his eyes on his beautiful white fur have disappeared! I had tried so many solutions without success. I can't think of anything different other than the change to this salmon food that could account for this. I'm guessing it has to do with the increased omegas and probiotics.
customer_reviews.author: Bonn

customer_reviews.title: Cancelling auto ship
customer_reviews.text: This was a great dog food. Something changed. My dogs turn their nose up and refuse to eat the last order. PLUS the bag had been opened and was taped shut. Potentially contaminated. Will no feed this to myndogs. Returning it. I’m cancelling auto ship.
customer_reviews.author: FT Fitness

customer_reviews.title: Never again will buy dog food from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why, but both dogs refused to even try this formula despite that I mixed it with an old food and added some chicken. I tried to return the 22 lb. bag, but it’s not available for return. Petco would gladly take the bag back, even if it was open, because they have a heart, and they wouldn't want you to be stuck with unwanted food and they would donate it to the shelter to feed some unfortunate souls, who don’t have a permanent home, yet.. I will never buy the dog food from Amazon, again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Quality is Questionable
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 20lb bag of dog food back in January for only $40, a steal compared to the $55 price now. I realized why it was such a good deal a few days later when I transferred the dog food into an airtight container. The bag had small cuts throughout and when I poured out the food, some of it had clumped together into the size of baseballs! I know some reviews of Merrick dog food purchased from Amazon mentioned the quality was horrible! They found mold and their dogs got violently ill. Luckily my dog is fine but I’m going to stick to ordering my dog food from Chewy from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Krystle

customer_reviews.title: Our Dog Won't Eat It
customer_reviews.text: Our dog ate a couple bites out of her dish and now will no longer eat it. We wanted a dog food that was grain free and contained things that were good for her. Salmon and sweet potatoes were some of the items our veterinarian suggested for her as she has a sensitive stomach. We bought a dog food from the vet now & hoping it will be something she will eat.
customer_reviews.author: Kent & Julie Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about the quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never had this problem before. My dog constantly threw this food up. This dog does not have food issues I can change his food out with no reactions.
customer_reviews.author: Conch29

customer_reviews.title: Totally changed my dogs coat
customer_reviews.text: Our 13 year old Shih Tzu absolutely loves this food. Most important is the high quality ingredients!! We always fed Iams and were happy with it until I compared ingredients. OMG. Switched immediately to Merrick. My dogs coat is gleaming. Just so impressed with this food!
customer_reviews.author: cmm

customer_reviews.title: Fur Baby Approved!
customer_reviews.text: The best brand and taste for my chihuahua. The bags are on the expensive side, however you have to spend money now to keep them healthy in their senior years. I can already see it working with the shine in her fur. You can smell the difference with "cheap" dog food and this brand right off the bat. The tiny pieces are easier to chew and tend to be less crumbly towards the end of the bag. Will be purchasing this brand again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M.

customer_reviews.title: Success
customer_reviews.text: My Havenese has been so picky about food. Can’t add up all that I have had to throw out. She likes the small bites and I still add in some wet or chicken. I have even noticed increased activity. She will just run on her own. I am enjoying this and so is she,
customer_reviews.author: M Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: I want my money back for the last three 25 pound bags.... 60 a pop
customer_reviews.text: My three will no longer touch this food. I agree with another review that something has recently changed! They are sick from this food now
customer_reviews.author: Jeany

customer_reviews.title: 100% RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.text: I got the 20 lb. bag of Merrick Lil' Plates Grain Free Dry Dog Food for Small Breed dogs, and it is phenomenal. My dog is a very picky eater, but since making the change to Lil' Plates...he loves eating. I am so happy to find a high nutritional quality, grain free dog food that he likes. The value of the product cannot be beat. I have seen an improvement in him physically and mentally in terms of energy. I want to give my pet the best nutrition possible, and I also want him to enjoy what he is eating. Even as a dog, you only live once!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffy

customer_reviews.title: not sure its suited for yorkies
customer_reviews.text: It seems I should have read the reviews more carefully. I purchased this food because my yorkie-poo has dry flakey skin and wanted a food to cater to that. I was transitioning him to it by mixing it in with his old food but all it did was give him violent diarrhea and make him lethargic and not eat. I had to throw the bag away. I feel so bad for my little guy.
customer_reviews.author: LKH

customer_reviews.title: Super tiny crunchies perfect for tiny dogs
customer_reviews.text: My pups love the Merrick brand dry food. The crunchies are a perfect size which is about the size of a pea. I have small dogs and tried their regular food as well and my babies can easily manage both. I have now ordered 2 different flavors in the 4 pound bags each month for 3 months so my babies don't get bored. They love the food and I love that it is a great healthy option they love. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Nature's Minion

customer_reviews.title: Quality food...she loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great brand for our little Min-Pin. She loves it and runs to her bowl when it's feeding time. I mix in just a bit of wet food for moisture. She loves the size of the small breed...bought the regular size by mistake once and she wouldn't touch it. She also prefers the red meat with sweet potatoes over this chicken. She is thriving on this and we are very pleased with this food.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Good food for your dog!
customer_reviews.text: This brand was recommended by my vet. I use to buy the more affordable brands from the stores, but it gave my dog a rash. After switching my dog to this specific bag of food, her rash went away. I have a Shih Tzu / Toy Poodle mix, so the small bites are perfect for her. This is the only food I buy her now. I also started buying my dog Merrick treats which she loves and it is good for her.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Allison

customer_reviews.title: 13-lb. Dog Woofs 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag of the Lil' Plates beef + sweet potato along with the pink-packaged small breed Classic flavor, which is chicken-based. Thought I'd give my little dog Solo a couple of choices. He got burned out on the buffalo kibble after a couple of years: started picking the bits out of the wet food where I'd step on them in the dark or he'd leave them altogether. I finally got a clue. (He LOVES the Classic flavor, another recent purchase.) Good product, excellent ingredients. The size of the kibble is appropriate for a little terrier's mouth too.
customer_reviews.author: Tassie Wussell

customer_reviews.title: Chihuahua refused to eat it!
customer_reviews.text: My chihuahua hates it. I was so hoping to get her off grains but she literally did not touch it for 2 days and went without food. I broke down and gave her the pro plan she was eating and she gobbled that up. Don't know why she disliked the beef one so much but going by her refusal to take one bite, 2 stars. She is very picky!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie CTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Smells like chocolate but isn't
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several bags of these, but my dog doesn't seem to like it very much. The kibble smells like chocolate at first, though no chocolate is in the bag and the ingredients are all very pure and dog safe. I actually bit into a kernel when she wouldn't eat and found the taste to be a combination of blueberries and steak. I switched her back to the Merrick wet food cups right after.
customer_reviews.author: Koriander Bullard

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality, Fussy Dog Likes It
customer_reviews.text: Dog seems to like it, but I cannot honestly comment on how it tastes. The bag quality is the best that I've seen, it's robust and seals better than any other that I have used. The product smells fresh and not like chemicals or offal, as some kibble does. Happy dog, happy owner!
customer_reviews.author: Loyal_Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Heard from dog experts that this brand is one of the better ones on the market. I always like to add some steamed chicken and other meats and veggies to my dog’s kibble anyway. I don’t trust just giving dry dog food alone no matter what brand. But I figure adding the kibble will cover all the bases to make sure she gets all the important nutrients from fresh and dry.
customer_reviews.author: BobbiVi

customer_reviews.title: Allergic to this bag
customer_reviews.text: My yorkie has been eating this brand of dog food for a couple months now but since opening this bag purchased on amazon she just doesn't seem herself....she almost acts like she is allergic to something in this bag. Yesterday we decided to stop feeding her the food and as soon as we did her symptoms stopped....looks like I have to find a new brand now....
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: I have fed my pups this dog food for years. It is of excellent quality and one of few brands that has all ingredients from the US. Amazon has a pretty good price on it, as well. If it is in your price range, I HIGHLY recommend this food.
customer_reviews.author: SAS

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients. Dogs like it. Happy them, happy us.
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs enjoy this food. One cant have Chicken and the other .... it keeps going. This food seems to taste good to them. It's a bit high in price but healthy works for me. And it does last. This comes packaged great for storing if your buying ahead of time!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: My pooch is spoiled
customer_reviews.text: My girl has been eating this brand since I brought her home 4 years ago. When she gets picky (because I share my food with her) I just add a spoon of Merrill wet and she’s good to go. No Digestion problems and she’s very healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet-as-Candy

customer_reviews.title: I adopted Zack two years ago when he was two ...
customer_reviews.text: I adopted Zack two years ago when he was two. He had not been neutered and had no chip. He was found on the street. He must not have been fed dry food because he didn't want to eat it but I tried several brands which resulted in unfortunate results. He has been on this diet for about a year and is thriving. I still have to add some scrambled egg or chicken and vegetables to the dry food.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley A.

customer_reviews.title: Upset Stomach
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my terrier mix got diarrhea every time I tried to feed her this food and I had to discontinue with the majority left in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Best kibble out there
customer_reviews.text: i've been buying this for my maltipoo for about 2-3 years now. He doesn't seem to get bored with it and was also on my vet recommended list. I did try to switch it up at one point (chicken) and that one he didnt care for, we'll be sticking to beef from here on out. Also, their line of snacks is awesome, Francois approved.
customer_reviews.author: M. Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: I used to have to supplement kibble with some soft but this was recommended by someone and man
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are all over this and they never get excited about kibble. I used to have to supplement kibble with some soft but this was recommended by someone and man, they were right. I only buy dog food made in the USA so this is now my dog food for life.
customer_reviews.author: ChevMDGuys

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Maltipoo approved
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! My Maltipoo puppy loved it and she does great with this formula. she’s devours this at every meal. It is her main food. Teeth are great so far and the probiotics seem to help her digest this and have very good stools. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Evan Nashville

customer_reviews.title: Dog did not like it
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what’s in this but my dog does not like it all all.
customer_reviews.author: withelmina yap

customer_reviews.title: On recent list of dog food that has caused deaths
customer_reviews.text: She didn’t like it nor did my daughters dogs. Luckily for us
customer_reviews.author: njanen

customer_reviews.title: My Dog's Rating!
customer_reviews.text: My little dog scarfs up the Merrick 'crunchies' that are usually served with Merrick canned food. Since nothing is left when Coco has dinner I'm assigning 5 stars for her!
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Leach

customer_reviews.title: One of the worst
customer_reviews.text: This product has been recalled and I refuse to feed it to my dog. I wish I could return it but evidently it’s been over 30 days. Terrible for dogs
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Richey

customer_reviews.title: Dogs got sick on most resent bag.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have been eating this food for about a year now. This last bag I got has been making both my dogs throw up after each serving. I am not sure what was going on with this batch. I stopped giving my dogs the food and they have not puked anymore. So I know it was the food.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Harris

customer_reviews.title: Quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: No digestive issues with this brand/flavor after many months using it, and her our dog doesn't have stains from her tears anymore (this is the only thing that changed since the last time her tears left dark streaks down her white face, as it has since we got her). She enjoys it very much. We did a lot of research and Merrick is one of the safest/best brands of dog food available.
customer_reviews.author: toxiccookie

customer_reviews.title: Quality ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for my mother’s dog and ship it to her. The ingredients make all the difference and it’s worth paying a little more for quality and the health of your loved pet. The bits are small, like the size of a flattened pea and B loves it so much more than his old dog food.
customer_reviews.author: J.G.

customer_reviews.title: Not for all doggo's
customer_reviews.text: My dogs initially loved it, but soon afterwards they had a pretty bad cause of diarrhea. Especially wasn't that pleasant since I had new carpet installed. If I could get my money back I would. Again, maybe it was just my girls that had a bad experience but, you know your kiddo best.
customer_reviews.author: Randy D.

customer_reviews.title: Shipping needs to be modified. Should be shipped alone or with soft items only
customer_reviews.text: I do love receiving this on a schedule. The one issue that I do have, is that it should not be shipped with the cat litter, or any other box inside of the shipping box. When the dog food is shipped with another product inside the shipping box, that is a box, it rips the dog food bag, and so I receive a shipping box full of dog food instead of a bag filled with dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Krause

customer_reviews.title: My dogs HATE this food with a passion
customer_reviews.text: My dogs will eat ANYTHING, except this dog food. They have chosen to starve rather than eat it. My Maltipoo gagged, my Frenchie is furious. Even doctoring it up didn't work. Never again, glad I bought the smallest bag.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Line - All the Flavors!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food! We actually switch between the chicken, salmon and beef with every bag. They have no stomach issues switching flavors, and it keeps them interested! Usually whenever we switch flavors with other brands, they have stomach issues. Such a relief we don't have to worry if one flavor is out of stock. We first did the salmon, as it was recommended by our vet. Then the chicken, and now we have just bought the Texas Beef. Buyer beware, the salmon is fishy...for sure. But it seems to attract even the pickiest of eaters noses.
customer_reviews.author: Britt J

customer_reviews.title: Good for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog digests this food very well and eats it consistently and has for 2 years. I recently decided to try Royal Canin for Shi Zhu and she ate it for 3 days then no more. Going back to Merrick
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Woodhams

customer_reviews.title: It was Good for Cosmo (Toy Poodle)
customer_reviews.text: My ToyPoodle suffers from sensitive stomach. He loved science diet and it was working good for him until he started getting really sick from it and I quickly changed his diet (it was recalled maybe two months after). I tried many name brands such as Blue Buffalo however they did not do his stomach good. A relative told me about Marrick and gave me a sample and Cosmo loved it. He’s not bloated and inactive and his stool is solid but not dry. Lol I’m glad I made the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Carlene

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! It just arrived in the mail today and I'm already impressed. For whatever reason my 1 year old Boston has been losing interest in his food. We've tried 4 different kinds in the last 2 months. With every other food it takes multiple times offering him the bowl of food to get him to eat. I don't know if it's because he's having a hard time smelling the food. This food was extremely fragrant when I opened it. It smelt like a bag of salmon. As soon as I placed the food in front of him he gobbled it up with no problems. It seems very promising.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: The only food we give our Shih Tzu Fifi
customer_reviews.text: This is the only dog food our Shih Tzu has had since we got her. She loves it and it's all we'll ever buy her.
customer_reviews.author: Dionne Y

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Y so x year old small.breed dog easily transitioned to this brand and he seems to love it. Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ShenValley

customer_reviews.title: Good formula for my dog’s food
customer_reviews.text: Can’t vouch for the flavor. Smells awful. Dog loves it. The salmon and sweet potato seem to agree with him after some trial with other grain free formulas. He was itchy and since the switch we’ve noticed a decrease in scratching and his coat is in great condition. The only thing we changed was his diet so I attribute his improvement to that.
customer_reviews.author: AmyG1978

customer_reviews.title: Purina bought the company:(
customer_reviews.text: Purina bought the company. Switching to another brand. The texture has changed.
customer_reviews.author: loriann

customer_reviews.title: Dog will not eat nor my neighbor's dog.
customer_reviews.text: Will donate to the animal shelter as you do not want it returned Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Victor Trola. v

customer_reviews.title: Dogs won't eat it
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 healthy dogs who have never refused to eat a quality food. They hate this one. I wish this company would offer more foods with healthy grains
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Chihuahua Approved
customer_reviews.text: My very picky chihuahua loves it and I'm confident in the ingredients and brand. The only negative I found on Merrick was a history of recalls, but those were only in 2010 and 2011, nothing since. The only thing I don't like is the bag isn't resealable, and a bag lasts me a while. Overall happy with my choice in dog food!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs with skin sensitivities
customer_reviews.text: I have two chihuahuas, and they both love this food. They've actually started trying to fool me into feeding them earlier and earlier each day! The kibble pieces are tiny and easy for little mouths to chew. One of my dogs gets hot spots and has a lot of food sensitivities (especially poultry) and Merrick has been the only food that doesn't irritate his skin. It's really hard to find dog food that does not have chicken in it! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: riotnrrrd

customer_reviews.title: A great way to give your dog something special for dinner!
customer_reviews.text: This is great dog food for my two little buddies. They like the taste, it is easy for them to eat, and it comes in a resealable bag. The food does smell like fish, but this is due to the ingredients. The ingredients do not include too many preservatives, and it is healthy as a result. All in all, it has also helped them maintain their weight.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Rated a 5 by dog food analysts
customer_reviews.text: Good for your dog and well worth the money. My Pom loves this food and the smaller size kibble makes it easier to fit in his Kong Toy which we use to feed him his first meal of the day. Not one kibble is left behind. Check out the nutrition levels in this food!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cheetah

customer_reviews.title: My dog got vomited twice on this dog food.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Maltese mix in excellent health. He is 8 years old and has never had a problem with his digestion or food allergies I was feeding him Merrick Black Country Raw Infused with no issues. I thought I would introduce a little variety and ordered Merrick Lil'Plates grain free real salmon. Both times I gave it to him he picked at it and then vomited. I stopped it immediately and went back to the Merrick Black Country Raw Infused. I highly advise not buying this dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Caspi

customer_reviews.title: This food was easy to substitute in his diet and works great for ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a gluten allergy that give him a rash. This food was easy to substitute in his diet and works great for his skin. He still poops more than I would expect out of a really great dog food so it seems there are too many fillers, but it is worth it since there is no way I am paying for the REALLY expensive food.
customer_reviews.author: Mime241

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs all love Merrick products. When I was changing them over from another brand to the Merrick, I noticed that they all had picked out the Merrick kibbles and left the old brand in the dish. I do read the ingredients on my pets food and I am pleased with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: bird song

customer_reviews.title: My dogs weren't very excited about this food
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was recommended by a guy at the post store as being very healthy. But my dogs aren't real crazy over it. They eat the Nitro Natural food better than this. I dint think I'll get it again.
customer_reviews.author: Suzann

customer_reviews.title: MY DOGS LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY FOUND A FOOD THAT ALL THREE OF OUR DOGS LIKE.
customer_reviews.author: PAM FORNSHELL

customer_reviews.title: but I feel like perhaps this food attributed to them
customer_reviews.text: My dog stopped eating it without hesitation, and I noticed she had grown 3 little lumps on her coat. I took her to the vet and luckily they're sebaceous cysts, but I feel like perhaps this food attributed to them. Since switching to Wellness CORE for small breeds, her coat is softer, shinier, she loves the food and gobbles it up every feeding, and no new lumps. Who knows, could be correlated or not.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Barack

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Need to sell the dog jerky i have brought every dog food and donating the bags to salvation army beceuse he wouldnt it any of it eats rhis brand
customer_reviews.author: Candee michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not for my dog
customer_reviews.text: This dog food received a very high rating on dog food advisor. That’s why am giving it three stars. But my dog, a 2 pound puppy toy poodle, did not like it. Would not eat it no matter what I did to the food.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L Costello

customer_reviews.title: High quality with a limited number of ingredients
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this and it is limited ingredient recipe means less sketchy stuff like “Chicken meal” consumed and easy to digest too. Merricks make a great lamb version too. I alternate the two recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Jadee

customer_reviews.title: and the picky little dogs downed it pretty quickly. Since I have two small dogs
customer_reviews.text: I had been feeding my small dogs Beneful until I read some negative things about it. I ordered 3 flavors of this, beef, chicken, and salmon, and the picky little dogs downed it pretty quickly. Since I have two small dogs, the size is perfect. I keep rotating between flavors to keep them interested and add some canned veggies too.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Finnicky Shih Tzu
customer_reviews.text: ** Good Price ** My Fur Baby Bizzy enjoys Merrick Dog food which offer small bites. With him being a 14 pound dog this food last Month and a 1/2 -2 month. Bizzy eats a little less than 1 cup.
customer_reviews.author: Treena

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love this brand and the little bites are perfect for them. They are 12 and 14 lbs. Our vet said stay away from Blue Buffalo or any food that is all protein or mostly protein because dogs need carbs too. This seems like a good balance without crappy fillers like corn meal.
customer_reviews.author: MicheleD

customer_reviews.title: Grain free connected to heart failure
customer_reviews.text: My personal veterinarian confirmed that “grain free” foods result in heart failure (cardio myopathy) in dogs. My wish is that these foods will be recalled immediately to prevent further unnecessary deaths.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Dunnam

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: My dogs refused to eat this. When they did it made them have upset stomaches.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Casey

customer_reviews.title: My dog Missi Rue now eats with more regularity. ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog Missi Rue now eats with more regularity. Her bowels have improved. She is a much healthier dog for it. I feel the price is worth is the health of my dog. I buy this brand on a regular basis and may try some other flavors, with the exception of chicken. She is allergic to chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Ricki Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: My shitzhu likes this food. She has had several teeth extracted but can still eat these small bits. Made in USA and quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Happy girl

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be top quality, can smell the flavor and dogs love it. Bit pricey for me though.
customer_reviews.author: Juddward

customer_reviews.title: Nasty
customer_reviews.text: Min pin did not like it what so ever. Had to buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Berry

product_meta.title: Merrick Lil' Plates Grain Free Real Lamb + Sweet Potato Small Breed Dry Dog Food
product_meta.description: Size:12 LBMerrick Lil' Plates Grain Free Small Breed Dry Dog Food Real Lamb + Sweet Potato Recipe is crafted specifically for small breed dogs. With real deboned lamb as the first ingredient, this small breed dog food helps to build and maintain healthy muscle tissue and energy levels. This natural dog food is crafted without grain or gluten ingredients, and every serving includes probiotics and prebiotic fiber for healthy digestion. Adding in leading levels of glucosamine and chondroitin for dogs makes a natural dog food recipe that helps to maintain healthy hips and joints. This lamb and sweet potato dog food features complete and balanced nutrition with omega 3 fatty acids that help maintain a healthy coat and skin. With a perfectly crunchy texture and small kibble size, this lamb dog food helps to reduce plaque and keep your dog’s teeth clean. Like all Merrick recipes, this small breed dog food was crafted in our Hereford, TX kitchen and cooked in the USA.
feature_bullets: One (1) 12.0 lb Bag - Merrick Lil' Plates Grain Free Small Breed Dry Dog Food Real Lamb + Sweet Potato Recipe
Real deboned lamb is always the first ingredient in this grain free dry dog food
Dry food for small dogs crafted with probiotics and prebiotic fiber for healthy digestion
Dry dog food for small dogs made with leading levels of glucosamine and chondroitin aids in maintaining healthy hips and joints
Omega 3 fatty acids help maintain a healthy coat and skin
